pages.blog: Blog - Worky Worky home about services blog OUR BLOG Fitting a Square Building Discover the intricacies of fitting a square building into various landscapes and urban environments. Learn about the challenges and innovative solutions involved in maximizing space efficiency while maintaining architectural integrity. Explore case studies and expert insights on how to achieve harmony between functionality and aesthetics in square building design. MODERN EXTENSION TO BRICK HOUSE Dive into the world of modern architectural extensions for brick houses, blending tradition with contemporary design principles. Explore cutting-edge techniques and materials used to seamlessly integrate new extensions with existing brick structures. Gain inspiration from stunning examples of modern brick house extensions, showcasing innovative approaches to space expansion and enhancement. Groundbreaking Women in Construction Celebrate the remarkable contributions of women in the construction industry, from architects and engineers to project managers and tradespeople. Discover inspiring stories of pioneering women who have shattered stereotypes and excelled in traditionally male-dominated fields. Explore initiatives and organizations dedicated to promoting gender diversity and empowering women in the construction sector. Tips on Buying a Fixer Upper Receive expert advice and valuable tips on navigating the process of purchasing a fixer-upper property. Learn how to assess the potential of a fixer-upper, including evaluating renovation costs and estimating the return on investment. Explore practical strategies for negotiating with sellers, securing financing, and managing renovation projects effectively to turn a fixer-upper into your dream home. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Worky Worky home about services blog Privacy Policy Data Collection: Worky collects information, including user preferences and project history, to enhance user experience and provide personalized services. Personal Information: Users may provide personal information voluntarily during interactions with Worky, such as submitting contact forms or requesting consultations. Use of Information: Collected data is used to communicate with users, fulfill service requests, and improve the quality of our architectural services. Third-Party Partners: Worky may share non-personal information with third-party partners for analytics and marketing purposes, but never sells personal information. Data Security: Worky employs security measures to protect user information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. Children's Privacy: Worky's services are not intended for users under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. Consent: By using Worky, users consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. Opt-Out: Users have the right to opt-out of marketing communications. Contact us for assistance. Updating Information: Users can review, update, or delete their personal information by contacting us. Policy Changes: Worky reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy. Users will be notified of any changes. Data Sharing: Personal information is not shared with third parties for marketing purposes. Non-personal information may be shared with partners for analytics. Data Retention: User information is retained for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Legal Compliance: Worky complies with applicable data protection laws and regulations. User Rights: Users have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights. Contact Information: For questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, contact our support team through the provided contact information. Feedback: We welcome user feedback regarding our Privacy Policy and overall experience with Worky. Communication: Users may receive project updates, appointment confirmations, and other relevant communications. Marketing Communications: Users may receive promotional emails. Opt-out options are provided in each marketing email. Payment Information: Worky does not store payment information. Payments are processed securely through trusted payment gateways. Phone +91-261-2341423 Address 8/763 opp SBI hanuman, Surat, Gujarat 395001, India LET’S GET IN TOUCH Monday — Thursday 10:00 – 23:00 Friday — Sunday 10:00 – 19:00 worky@gmail.com Worky Privacy Policy Terms conditions
